subSections.title: Readings
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|威%力|い%りょく}}: power, might
* {{ja-r|威%勢|い%せい}}: spirits, power
* {{ja-r|威%張る|い%ばる}}: put on airs, boast
* {{ja-r|権%威|けん%い}}: authority, power
* {{ja-r|示%威|じ%い}}: show of force
* {{ja-r|猛%威|もう%い}}: fierceness, fury
* {{ja-r|球%威 の 有る 投%球|きゅう%い の ある とう%きゅう}}: powerful delivery
* {{ja-r|威%厳|い%げん}}: solemn dignity
* {{ja-r|威%風|い%ふう}}: majesty, dignity
* {{ja-r|威%容|い%よう}}: dignified appearance
* {{ja-r|威%儀|い%ぎ}}: dignity, dignified manner
* {{ja-r|威%信|い%しん}}: prestige, dignity
* {{ja-r|威%圧|い%あつ}}: coercion, high-handedness
* {{ja-r|威%嚇|い%かく}}: intimidate, threaten
* {{ja-r|脅%威|きょう%い}}: threat, menace
{{der-bottom}}
